raw_body:
THIAGARAJAH NADESWARAN – Loving son of late Vaithialingam Tyagarajah and late Sethurajah Jothimani,​ beloved husband of Kalvi,​ precious father of Rishya (UK),​ father-in-law of Kavitha (UK) and devoted grandfather of Ria (UK) & Esha (UK),​ brother-in-law of late Jegatheeswaran (Bapu) & Ophelia,​ Uma & Noeline Jeganathan,​ Lakshmi Jeganathan,​ late Sridharan & late Rajini Jeganathan,​ late Hariharan & Lyn (UK),​ expired peacefully on February 20th 2024. Viewing at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour on Thursday,​ 22nd February from 9.30 a.m. to 7.00 p.m. Friday,​ 23rd February from 9.30 a.m. to 7.00 p.m. and Saturday 24th February from 9.30 a.m. to 2.45 p.m. and thereafter Cremation at General Cemetery – Kanatte at 3.30 p.m. (New Crematorium).
012766
